data.name: ConfigDescriptionsTitle
data.value: Configuration Descriptions
data.comment: The title of this class.

data.name: ConfigDescriptionsDescription
data.value: Contains localizable resources for Sitefinity configuration descriptions.
data.comment: The description of this class.

data.name: LanguageSourceCaption
data.value: Source for available languages
data.comment: phrase: Source for available languages

data.name: LanguageSourceDescription
data.value: Defines the source for available languages.
data.comment: phrase: Defines the source for available languages.

data.name: HideIfSingleLanguageCaption
data.value: Hide if single language
data.comment: phrase: Hide if single language

data.name: HideIfSingleLanguageDescription
data.value: Defines whether to hide the field if only a single language is found.
data.comment: phrase: Defines whether to hide the field if only a single language is found.

data.name: AvailableLanguagesCaption
data.value: List of all cultures
data.comment: phrase: List of all cultures

data.name: AvailableLanguagesDescription
data.value: Defines the list of all listed cultures. This is only used if LanguageSource is set to Custom.
data.comment: phrase: Defines the list of all listed cultures. This is only used if LanguageSource is set to Custom.

data.name: ItemsInGroupCountCaption
data.value: Number of items in a group
data.comment: phrase: Number of items in a group

data.name: ItemsInGroupCountDescription
data.value: Defines the number of items in a group.
data.comment: phrase: Defines the number of items in a group.

data.value: Option for all languages
data.comment: phrase: Option for all languages

data.name: AddAllLanguagesOptionDescription
data.value: Defines whether an option for all languages should be added.
data.comment: phrase: Defines whether an option for all languages should be added.

data.value: Command name
data.comment: phrase: Command name
